name: Postural Orthostatic Tachycardia Syndrome (POTS) Mechanics - DnD 5e
name_original: Postural Orthostatic Tachycardia Syndrome (POTS) Mechanics - DnD 5e
description:
These mechanics for Postural Orthostatic Tachycardia Syndrome (POTS) are built for DnD 5e and highly customizable. Since POTS can present in multiple ways, with varying symptoms by person, these mechanics allow you to fully choose how it presents in your character. 

Written by and consulted on by people with POTS. 

Screenreader accessible pdf.
